tasks.label: Lint: Pylint (report)
args: D:/GitHub/Adlist-Parser/.venv/Scripts/python.exe -m pylint adparser --output-format=text | Out-File -FilePath pylint-report.txt -Encoding utf8; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { Write-Host "Pylint completed with issues (non-zero exit), report saved to pylint-report.txt"; exit 0 }
